name: Level Info
description: A QoL mod that displays information about the level you are on. Pretty much everything can be enabled/disabled, even the text color can be customized!

text-color.name: Text color
text-color.description: The color in which the text is displayed

show-requested-stars.name: Requested Stars
show-requested-stars.description: Displays the star difficulty requested by the creator

show-featured-rank.name: Featured Rank
show-featured-rank.description: Displays the featured rank of the level

show-object-count.name: Object Count
show-object-count.description: Indicates how many objects are in the level (might be inacurate for levels with more than 65535 objects)

show-two-player-mode.name: 2 Player mode
show-two-player-mode.description: Indicates if the level is using 2 player mode

show-game-version.name: Game Version
show-game-version.description: Display the game version in which the level was posted

show-level-version.name: Level Version
show-level-version.description: Displays the current version of a level

show-editor-time.name: Editor Time
show-editor-time.description: Shows how much time the creator(s) of the level spent in the editor

show-editor-time-copies.name: Editor Time (+copies)
show-editor-time-copies.description: Shows how much time the creator(s) of the level spent in the editor (with copies)

show-total-attempts.name: Attempts
show-total-attempts.description: Show how many attempts you spent on the level

show-total-jumps.name: Jumps
show-total-jumps.description: Show how many times you jumped in the level

show-clicks.name: Clicks
show-clicks.description: Show how many times you clicked during your best attempt

show-attempt-time.name: Best time
show-attempt-time.description: Show your best time on a level
